declarations.description:
A dialog web component that allows docking a video player or
putting it in a lightbox. It allows implementing a similar
feature as amp-video-docking but without using AMP.
declarations.name: GlomexDialogElement

members.name: refreshDockDialog
members.description:
Forces repositioning docked dialog element.
Should be called when an external "dock-target" changed
its size or position.

attributes.name: aspect-ratio
attributes.description: The aspect-ratio for the inline element. Default is 16:9

attributes.name: dock-target
attributes.description: A dom-element with position:fixed where mode=dock should animate to

attributes.name: dock-target-inset
attributes.description: Allows positions the dock target (which corner to dock to)

attributes.name: dock-aspect-ratio
attributes.description: The aspect-ratio when the element is mode=dock

attributes.name: dock-mode
attributes.description: When set to "sticky" it behaves similar to "position: sticky" in CSS (with a max width of 400px). If undefined docks the content to a corner.

attributes.name: dock-sticky-target-top
attributes.description: The top distance for dock-mode=sticky in pixels (defaults to 0)

attributes.name: dock-sticky-aspect-ratio
attributes.description: The aspect-ratio when the element is docked for dock-mode=sticky

attributes.name: dock-downscale
attributes.description: Do you want to scale the element when mode=dock
